boost::constrained_value::bounded

bounded Struct Template Reference

An alias of constrained for bounded object types (using within_bounds constraint policy). More...

Detailed Description

template<typename ValueType, typename LowerType = ValueType, typename UpperType = LowerType, typename ErrorPolicy = throw_exception<>, typename LowerExclType = boost::mpl::false_, typename UpperExclType = LowerExclType, typename CompareType = std::less<ValueType>>
struct boost::constrained_value::bounded< ValueType, LowerType, UpperType, ErrorPolicy, LowerExclType, UpperExclType, CompareType >

An alias of constrained for bounded object types (using within_bounds constraint policy).
